desc: Tianello is a USA based company specializing in eco-friendly garments made from natural fibers. We are known for our Tencel clothing, Linen clothing, Plus-Size clothing, Washable Silk tanks, tunic, tops & blouses. All garments are garment dyed which means that they are “Preshrunk” and dry cleaning is not necessary.

layout.text: Check what's new and shop our beautiful Knits, Silks, Linens and Tencel.
